first_turn: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay {00003} bail as soon as possible

dialogue.text: {00001}Hello, this is {00002}Police Department Your son-in-law was arrested by us yesterday for prostitution. This incident is not a good thing. If you want many people to know, pay {00003} bail as soon as possible
Oh my, I can't believe this is happening. How do I go about paying {00003} bail?
{00001}You need to provide your bank account details, and {00002}Police Department will arrange the transfer quickly.
Alright, I'll get my information ready. Thank you for notifying me.

first_turn: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I wonder if you need the exam questions. Can you fill in the link you sent you for a while and finish the reservation?

dialogue.text: Hello, here is the manual customer service of {00004}. As the exam is approaching, I wonder if you need the exam questions. Can you fill in the link you sent you for a while and finish the reservation?
Oh, that sounds really helpful! Can you tell me more about how this works?
Certainly! Once you fill in the link, we will send you the questions straight to your email associated with {00004}.
Great! Is there a fee for this service or is it included with my {00004} membership?
There's just a small processing fee, but it's all handled through the link I mentioned earlier.

first_turn: The exam will be in a few days. How are you preparing? The exam will be in next week. I'm so nervous

dialogue.text: The exam will be in a few days. How are you preparing? The exam will be in next week. I'm so nervous
I think you've dialed the wrong number, but nice try with your little act.

first_turn: Hello, it takes you a few minutes. This is the customer service of the {00005} agency center. Our agency recently launched a high-value credit card acceptance service. It does not require too many procedures. As long as you pay the {00006} handling fee, you can get it for you.

dialogue.text: Hello, it takes you a few minutes. This is the customer service of the {00005} agency center. Our agency recently launched a high-value credit card acceptance service. It does not require too many procedures. As long as you pay the {00006} handling fee, you can get it for you.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What exactly do I need to do to get started?
All you need to do is provide your basic contact information and settle the {00006} handling fee. We can help you with the rest.
That seems easy enough. How do I pay the {00006} fee?
You can pay through a secure link that I'll send you via email or text. Once we receive the payment, we'll process your application immediately.
Alright, please send me the link, and I'll have a look at it.

first_turn: Sorry to bother you, I am a staff member of the Venezuelan Embassy. The passport accepted with your ID is suspected of illegal entry. An arrest warrant has been issued to you. You need to pay £1,000 to avoid being arrested.

dialogue.text: Sorry to bother you, I am a staff member of the Venezuelan Embassy. The passport accepted with your ID is suspected of illegal entry. An arrest warrant has been issued to you. You need to pay £1,000 to avoid being arrested.
Oh no, that's shocking! What do I need to do to resolve this?
